segment.source: Planning to Deploy App-V 5.1 with an Electronic Software Distribution System
segment.target: Planning to Deploy App-V 5.1 with an Electronic Software Distribution System

segment.source: Planning to Deploy App-V 5.1 with an Electronic Software Distribution System
segment.target: Planning to Deploy App-V 5.1 with an Electronic Software Distribution System

segment.source: Planning to Deploy App-V 5.1 with an Electronic Software Distribution System
segment.target: Planning to Deploy App-V 5.1 with an Electronic Software Distribution System

segment.source: If you are using an electronic software distribution system to deploy App-V packages, review the following planning considerations.
segment.target: If you are using an electronic software distribution system to deploy App-V packages, review the following planning considerations.

segment.source: For information about using System Center Configuration Manager to deploy App-V, see Introduction to Application Management in Configuration Manager.
segment.target: For information about using System Center Configuration Manager to deploy App-V, see Introduction to Application Management in Configuration Manager.

segment.source: Review the following component and architecture requirements options that apply when you use an ESD to deploy App-V packages:
segment.target: Review the following component and architecture requirements options that apply when you use an ESD to deploy App-V packages:

segment.source: The App-V Management server, Management database, and Publishing server are not required.
segment.target: The App-V Management server, Management database, and Publishing server are not required.

segment.source: These functions are handled by the implemented ESD solution.
segment.target: These functions are handled by the implemented ESD solution.

segment.source: You can deploy the App-V Reporting server and Reporting database side by side with the ESD.
segment.target: You can deploy the App-V Reporting server and Reporting database side by side with the ESD.

segment.source: The side-by-side deployment lets you to collect data and generate reports.
segment.target: The side-by-side deployment lets you to collect data and generate reports.

segment.source: If you enable the App-V client to send report information, and you are not using the App-V Reporting server, the reporting data is stored in associated .xml files.
segment.target: If you enable the App-V client to send report information, and you are not using the App-V Reporting server, the reporting data is stored in associated .xml files.

segment.source: Add or vote on suggestions here.
segment.target: Add or vote on suggestions here.

segment.source: For App-V issues, use the App-V TechNet Forum.
segment.target: For App-V issues, use the App-V TechNet Forum.
